docs.title: CommerceTradeShop is a minecraft faric mod which allow commercial minecraft server owners to trade their items with real money
docs.text: You can download its Free Version in here Modrinth You can also buy its Premium Version in here Patreon

docs.title: Disclaimer for CommerceTradeShop
docs.text:
Disclaimer for CommerceTradeShop

Please read this disclaimer carefully before using CommerceTradeShop.

1. Acceptance of Terms By using CommerceTradeShop, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions outlined in this disclaimer. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the mod.

2. Purpose of the Mod CommerceTradeShop is designed to enhance the gaming experience in Minecraft by allowing players and servers to engage in real-world monetary transactions through the use of Stripe. The mod facilitates the integration of a payment system for in-game services or items.

3. Financial Transactions The mod enables financial transactions through the Stripe payment gateway. Users engaging in such transactions are responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations regarding online payments and financial transactions. The mod creator, Breswii, is not responsible for any legal consequences or disputes arising from such transactions.

4. Security While CommerceTradeShop is developed with security in mind, it is essential to understand that online transactions always carry inherent risks. Users are advised to use secure and private networks when making transactions. The mod creator is not liable for any breaches, hacking, or unauthorized access to user data.

5. Compatibility and Updates The mod creator will make efforts to ensure compatibility with the latest Minecraft versions and Stripe API updates. However, it is the user's responsibility to check for updates and ensure the mod's compatibility with their Minecraft version and Stripe API version.

6. No Warranty CommerceTradeShop is provided "as is" without any warranty, expressed or implied. The mod creator makes no representations or warranties of any kind concerning the mod, including but not limited to its functionality, security, or suitability for a particular purpose.

7. Limitation of Liability In no event shall the mod creator be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of the use or inability to use CommerceTradeShop, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.

8. Modification of Terms The mod creator reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any aspect of CommerceTradeShop and its terms of use at any time without notice. Users are encouraged to review this disclaimer regularly for any updates.

By using CommerceTradeShop, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this disclaimer. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the mod.

Breswii 2023.12.8

docs.title: name
docs.text: Your shop name

docs.title: size
docs.text: Your shop GUI size

docs.title: item id
docs.text: A unique id of your item

docs.title: item title
docs.text: your item title

docs.title: type
docs.text: choose what type your item want to show

docs.title: value
docs.text:
your shop item's skull value which you can find more in below link

MinecraftHead

docs.title: id
docs.text:
your shop item's item icon id

Warning * Make sure your icon id is lower letters, like "dirt"

docs.title: buyable
docs.text:
It's a boolean value, if you want your item to be buyable, set it to true, if not, set it to false

Warning * When your Buyable is true, Make sure your Commands isn't empty

docs.title: prid
docs.text: Your product's price id in stripe

docs.title: pos
docs.text:
Your item's position in shop

Warning * Make sure your pos lower than your shop size

docs.title: command id
docs.text: Your item's command unique id in shop

docs.title: command
docs.text:
When player have bought your item the command will be executed

Warning * Make sure your command have a "/" in the front, like "/time set day"

docs.title: permission
docs.text: "1" means player to run the command, "2" means server to run the command

docs.title: cd:
docs.text: When your player click check buy icon, there will be a cooldown time. Use second unit

docs.title: AM:
docs.text:
A boolean which is true means your item have animation.

Warning * When you ser it to true, the icon will not be use

docs.title: interval(iv):
docs.text: your animation interval. Use tick unit

docs.title: Random(rd):
docs.text: When you set it to true, the Animation will be random.

docs.title: amitems:
docs.text:
They will be show as the queue.

Warning * When AM is true, make sure this is not empty

docs.title: count:
docs.text: Set yout icon counts.

docs.title: lore:
docs.text:
Set your item's lore. Lores support color and placeholder. Check the details below link.

PlaceholderAPI

docs.title: glow:
docs.text: Set your item to glow. a boolean value.

docs.title: web:
docs.text:
Set your item to the website after buy the product.

Warning Make sure web is not empty Make sure web be like " https://google.com "

docs.title: 1. Place CommerceTradeShop mod in mods folder
docs.text:
• Place CommerceTradeShop mod in the mods folder
  • Start the server

docs.title: 2. Stop server and setting Stripe
docs.text:
• When your server finished load CommerceTradeShop mod, stop your server
  • Your minecraft server folders 'config/commercetradeshop/' will be like below

docs.title: 3. Create your Stripe account and get your API key
docs.text:
• open Stripe Website
  • create a stripe account

docs.title: 4. Create your product in Stripe(TEST)
docs.text:
• Try to create a product in Stripe

⬇⬇⬇MAKE SURE ITS ONE-OFF⬇⬇⬇

  • Click your product page
  • Copy your product's price api id and store it in a place

docs.title: 5. Test api(TEST)
docs.text:
• Copy your test api
  • Paste api in your config/commercetradeshop/account.json

docs.title: 6. Create your shops
docs.text:
• Download the shop generator ShopGenerator
  • Watch the video to learn How to use ShopGenerator
  • The more details about shop json is in ShopGeneratorDetails
  • Then put the json file into config/commercetradeshop/shops
  • Last, start your server to preview use /shop <your-json-file-name-which-is-also-shop-name> just like /shop free which means shop's json file is free.json in the shops folder

docs.title: 7. Stripe recognize and Real trade
docs.text:
• When you get ready to have a real money trade:
  • Continue to recognize your stripe account
  • Remember to close the button and change your test api in config/commercetradeshop/account.json to the REAL API

docs.title: 8. For more detail
docs.text:
1. Search the wiki
  2. Add Discord Server
  3. Add Patreon VIP

docs.title: 1. Place CommerceTradeShop mod in mods folder

  • Start the server

  • Your minecraft server folders 'config/commercetradeshop/' will be like below

docs.title: 3. Create your Stripe account and get your API key
docs.text:
• open Stripe Website
  • create a stripe account

docs.title: 4. Create your product in Stripe(TEST)
docs.text:
• Try to create a product in Stripe

⬇⬇⬇MAKE SURE ITS ONE-OFF⬇⬇⬇

  • Click your product page
  • Copy your product's price api id and store it in a place

docs.title: 5. Test api(TEST)
docs.text:
• Copy your test api
  • Paste api in your config/commercetradeshop/account.json
  • And place the email and password in config/commercetradeshop/account.json which you send me in patreon

docs.title: 6. Create your shops
docs.text:
• Download the shop generator ShopGenerator
  • Watch the video to learn How to use ShopGenerator
  • The more details about shop json is in ShopGeneratorDetails
  • Then put the json file into config/commercetradeshop/shops
  • Last, start your server to preview use /shop <your-json-file-name-which-is-also-shop-name> just like /shop free which means shop's json file is free.json in the shops folder

docs.title: 7. Stripe recognize and Real trade
docs.text:
• When you get ready to have a real money trade:
    1. Continue to recognize your stripe account
    4. Remember to close the button and change your test api in config/commercetradeshop/account.json to the REAL API
